Detailed Description

Identifies the primary cities in each country.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

static LabelResult edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.PrimaryCities.findPrimaryCities ( LatLonGrid  population,
LatLonGrid  countries,
File  out 
) [static] 

00031                                                                                                        {
00032         // find cities from population data using watershed
00033         write(out, population, "pop", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00034         EnhancedWatershedSegmenter seg = new EnhancedWatershedSegmenter(10, 1, 600, 10, 5);
00035         LabelResult label = seg.label(population);
00036         RegionProperty[] popProps = RegionProperty.compute(label, population);
00037         write(out, label.label, "allcities", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00038         
00039         // initialize primary-cities
00040         int ncountries = 1 + new MaxValueFilter().findHighestValued(countries).value;
00041         int[] primaryCity = new int[ncountries]; // one for each country
00042         for (int i=0; i < ncountries; ++i){
00043             primaryCity[i] = -1; // none
00044         }
00045         
00046         // go through the cities and assign them to their appropriate country
00047         for (int i=1; i < popProps.length; ++i){
00048             LatLon centroid = population.getLocation(popProps[i].getCx(), popProps[i].getCy());
00049             int country = countries.getValue(centroid);
00050             if (country >= 0){
00051                 if (primaryCity[country] < 0){
00052                     primaryCity[country] = i; // first city in country
00053                 } else {
00054                     // the primary city is the one with the greater avg population
00055                     int previous = primaryCity[country];
00056                     if (popProps[i].getCval() > popProps[previous].getCval()){
00057                         primaryCity[country] = i;
00058                     }
00059                 }
00060             }
00061         }
00062         
00063         // keep only those cities that are primary
00064         boolean[] keep = new boolean[popProps.length];
00065         for (int i=0; i < ncountries; ++i){
00066             if (primaryCity[i] >= 0){
00067                 int regno = primaryCity[i];
00068                 keep[regno] = true;
00069             }
00070         }       
00071         return RegionProperty.prune(label, keep);
00072     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.datamining.PrimaryCities.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00084                                                             {
00085         // create output directory
00086         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("primary");
00087         
00088         // read input (crop to cover Spain)
00089         LatLonGrid pop    = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.WORLD).crop(980, 4080, 220, 350);
00090         LatLonGrid countries = CountryPolygons.readGrid(CountryPolygons.WORLD_GRID);
00091         LabelResult primary = PrimaryCities.findPrimaryCities(pop, countries, out);
00092         
00093         KmlWriter.write(primary.label, out, "primarycities", PngWriter.createRandomColormap());
00094     }
